value.title: Different ways to work with Microsoft Excel in Power BI
value.excerpt: Adam looks at the different ways you can use Microsoft Excel with Power BI. So many choices!  Guy in a Cube courses: https://guyinacu.be/courses  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Explaining what a Lakehouse is!
value.excerpt: You've probably heard the term lakehouse with various services like Azure Synapse Analytics. But what actually is a lakehouse? And why is it different from a data warehouse?  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level?

value.title: Exploring Microsoft Purview for data governance
value.excerpt: You've probably heard of Microsoft Purview somewhere. Buck Woody joins Patrick to highlight how Microsoft Purview can help you with data governance. From cataloging to lineage, Purview is a key component for your data strategy!  Connect with Buck: https://twitter.com/BuckWoodyMSFT https://www.linkedin.com/in/buckwoody/

value.title: Get started with SPARK in Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Using Spark in Azure Synapse Analytics opens up a lot of possibilities to work with your data. Venk joins us to get you started with setting it up and quickly using data. value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: In this video, Christian Wade joined Adam Saxton to discuss Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium. You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts.  Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh

value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports. value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters

value.title: Using R Visuals with Power BI
value.excerpt: You can take advantage of the R Script showcase to start using R Visuals with your reports.
